channel.title: NYS:PCG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:PCG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: PG&E Falls on Newsom Plan for Investor Payment into Fund
item.description: PG&E Corp. shares fell on a proposal by California Governor Gavin Newsom that would require the utility company’s shareholders to make a significant contribution to the replenishment of California
